description:
Zoho CRM for administrators is designed for the Zoho administrators users who are just getting started with Zoho and want to customize the CRM for their business. This course explains all of the core customization and setup of Zoho CRM and aims to get a new Zoho CRM administrator comfortable with setting up the CRM in a way that's optimal for their business.

By the end of the course, users should be able to setup and customize Zoho CRM specifically for their business, and should be familiar with various administrative functions available in Zoho CRM.

The people that should take this course are:

  • People who are set up with Admin privileges on their Zoho CRM account.
  • People who are responsible for managing the backend of the CRM.
title: Zoho CRM for Administrators
